title: Integration with CyberArk
description: This document describes the procedure to configure the BlockID Admin Console as a passwordless authentication solution for your organization's CyberArk Privileged Access Security (PAS) users. This integration will allow your users to log in to CyberArk Password Vault Web Access (PVWA) application  leveraging their biometrics. The biometric options include TouchID / FaceID and LiveID.
